name: Mr. Hooper
description: A kindly-looking shopkeeper stands behind the counter, wearing an apron that has seen better days but refuses to surrender to them. His smile is professionally warm, with just a hint of 'I've seen some things' around the edges.
dialogue: Welcome to Hooper's! We have everything you need and several things you don't!
Those cookies are fresh! Well, fresh-adjacent. Fresh-inspired.
I've been running this store for... *counts on fingers* ...too long.
Need supplies? Of course you do. Everyone needs supplies. That's why they're called supplies and not 'optionals'.
